## sx variable

A wrapper around the `@styled-system/css` for composing multiple themed styles together in the `css` prop.

```tsx
const Component = () => {
  const { sx, css } = useRemirrorTheme();
  const stringStyles = css`
    font-weight: bold;
  `;

  return <div css={sx({ variant: 'simple' }, stringStyles)} />;
};

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sx: RemirrorThemeContextType['sx']
```
